name: unwittingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is done without knowing or planning: I apologize for any anxiety which I may, unwittingly, have caused. Unwittingly, I may have given a misleading impression in my interviews. See
unwitting
More examplesFewer examplesShe may have unwittingly misled voters.People have signed up to receive these messages, although they may have done it unwittingly.She had broken the law unwittingly, but still she had broken it.
